thread.title: Tom Daley Reveals Further Details About Dustin Lance Black Engagement
thread.title_full: Tom Daley Reveals Further Details About Dustin Lance Black Engagement

author: Ashley Percival
title: Tom Daley Reveals Further Details About Dustin Lance Black Engagement
text:
Tom Daley Reveals Further Details About Dustin Lance Black Engagement The Huffington Post UK | By Ashley Percival 
Tom Daley has revealed more details about his engagement to Dustin Lance Black . READ MORE: 
The pair announced their happy news with a subtle notice in The Times on Thursday , and now the Olympic diver has seemingly told fans it was him who popped the question. 
Tom Daley and Dustin Lance Black 
Tom posted a picture of the newspaper notice with his and Dustin‚Äôs matching engagement rings. 
He wrote alongside the snap: ‚Äú#HeSaidYES üíçüíçand then #ISaidYES ‚ù§Ô∏è,‚Äù which suggested he got down on bended knee first. 
He also thanked fans for their support, adding: ‚ÄúThanks for all the lovely messages!‚Äù 
The announcement read: "The engagement is announced between Tom, son of Robert and Debra Daley of Plymouth, and Lance, son of Jeff Bisch of Philadelphia and Anne Bisch of Lake Providence." A photo posted by Tom Daley (@tomdaley1994) on Oct 2, 2015 at 12:12am PDT 
Tom‚Äôs mum Debbie also told the Plymouth Herald: "The whole family is extremely excited and looking forward to the big day. They are going to wait until after the Olympic Games in Rio before they decide on the date of the wedding and where they want to marry." 
The couple have been together for over two years, after meeting in a London nightclub. 
News of their relationship came to light following Tom‚Äôs decision to come out in a YouTube video in 2013 . 
The pair recently set up home together in east London to be near the Olympic pool in Stratford, where Tom trains almost daily. 
Dustin relocated from the States, where he has enjoyed massive success as a screenwriter, winning an Oscar in 2008 for his film ‚ÄòMilk‚Äô, and is also a huge LGBT rights activist.
